name: The Denpa Men 3: The Rise of Digitoll
name_original: The Denpa Men 3: The Rise of Digitoll
description:
The Denpa Men 3: The Rise of Digitoll is a RPG game developed by Genius Sonority. It came out on 07-08-2013. It was published by Genius Sonority.
The Denpa Men 3: The Rise of Digitoll is available on Nintendo 3DS.
It was scored by Hitoshi Sakimoto.
